code: import React from'react';var Tab=function Tab(props){var id=props.id,header=props.header,active=props.active;var activeStatus=active?' active':'';var closeIcon;if(typeof props.closeIcon==='string')closeIcon=React.createElement("i",{className:props.closeIcon});else if(typeof props.closeIcon==='object')closeIcon=props.closeIcon;else{var closecls=props.position==='right'?"fa fa-caret-right":"fa fa-caret-left";closeIcon=React.createElement("i",{className:closecls});}return React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,React.createElement("div",{id:id,className:"sidebar-pane"+activeStatus},React.createElement("h1",{className:"sidebar-header"},header,React.createElement("div",{className:"sidebar-close",onClick:props.onClose},closeIcon)),props.children));};export default Tab;
